continuum.slice

Interface Scan

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NScan

    public interface Scan
    Scan over space time

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Collector collector()
      User supplied Collector to add to the scan in addition to the standard group,interval,values,etc
      Continuum.Dimension dimension()
      The dimension to scan on, space (name) or time (timestamp)
      long end()
      Timestamp to end scan range (the largest timestamp), expresed in millisecond epoch
      Fields fields()
      Field names and values to filter on.
      Filter filter()
      User supplied Filter to add to the scan in addition to any implied filters on timestamps, particles, and fields
      Function function()
      Aggregation function for slice's 'values' field.
      java.lang.String[] groups()
      Result groupings on particles
      ScanID ID()
      Non-unique ID for this scan
      Interval interval()
      Date range interval to bucket results If non-null, scan results are bucketed into date ranges using the {#getFunction()} aggreagate function If null, scan results are atom-in-time values
      java.lang.String name()
      The measurement name to scan for
      Particles particles()
      Tag names and values to filter on.
      long start()
      Timestamp to begin scan range (the smallest timestamp), expresed in millisecond epoch

    • Method Detail

      • ID

        ScanID ID()
        Non-unique ID for this scan
        Returns:
        ID used to begin slab seek

      • dimension

        Continuum.Dimension dimension()
        The dimension to scan on, space (name) or time (timestamp)

      • name

        java.lang.String name()
        The measurement name to scan for
        Returns:
        measurement name

      • particles

        Particles particles()
        Tag names and values to filter on. Or WILDCARD Tags should be used for optimized queries
        Returns:
        particles values to filter on

      • fields

        Fields fields()
        Field names and values to filter on. Fields should be used infrequently to filter on
        Returns:
        field values to filter on

      • function

        Function function()
        Aggregation function for slice's 'values' field. If non-null, scan results are aggreagate values. If null, scan results will have raw measurement values
        Returns:
        aggregation function

      • start

        long start()
        Timestamp to begin scan range (the smallest timestamp), expresed in millisecond epoch
        Returns:
        unix epoch in milliseconds

      • end

        long end()
        Timestamp to end scan range (the largest timestamp), expresed in millisecond epoch
        Returns:
        unix epoch in milliseconds

      • interval

        Interval interval()
        Date range interval to bucket results If non-null, scan results are bucketed into date ranges using the {#getFunction()} aggreagate function If null, scan results are atom-in-time values
        Returns:
        time unit

      • groups

        java.lang.String[] groups()
        Result groupings on particles
        Returns:
        particle names to group by

      • collector

        Collector collector()
        User supplied Collector to add to the scan in addition to the standard group,interval,values,etc
        Returns:
        optional user defined collector

      • filter

        Filter filter()
        User supplied Filter to add to the scan in addition to any implied filters on timestamps, particles, and fields
        Returns:
        optional user defined filter
